m_szDocSumamry: PESWiki.com -- Pure Energy Systems Wiki:  Finding and Facilitating the Best Exotic Free Energy Technologies      Directory:Cool Earth Solar From PESWiki Jump to: navigation, search <> Cool Earth Solar (CES) has developed an inflatable solar concentrator technology that slashes materials costs, making solar competitive with commercial electricity generation systems. The design consists of two 2.5-meter diameter sheets of plastic (Mylar) sealed around the perimeter like a party balloon. One sheet is clear, and the other has a thin coating of aluminum to make it reflective. They are then inflated
